mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, AA.* from (select * from memo where receiverID = #{userID} and deleted = 0 -- 정상 작동 order by memoID desc) AA) -- and deleted = 0을 이곳에 넣으면 쪽지가 뷰페이지에서 2개씩 나타나고 사라짐 where rnum between #{startNo} and #{endNo}
select count(*) from memo where receiverID = #{userID} and deleted = 0
select * from (select rownum rnum, AA.* from (select * from memo where receiverID = #{userID} and deleted = 1 order by memoID desc) AA) where rnum between #{startNo} and #{endNo}
select count(*) from memo where receiverID = #{userID} and deleted = 1
select * from (select rownum rnum, AA.* from (select * from memo where receiverID = #{userID} and important = 1 and deleted = 0 order by memoID desc) AA) where rnum between #{startNo} and #{endNo}
select count(*) from memo where receiverID = #{userID} and important = 1 and deleted = 0
select * from (select rownum rnum, AA.* from (select * from memo where receiverID = #{userID} and marked = 1 and deleted = 0 order by memoID desc) AA) where rnum between #{startNo} and #{endNo}
select count(*) from memo where receiverID = #{userID} and marked = 1 and deleted = 0
select * from (select rownum rnum, AA.* from (select * from memo where receiverID = #{userID} and isnew = 0 and deleted = 0 order by memoID desc) AA) where rnum between #{startNo} and #{endNo}
select count(*) from memo where receiverID = #{userID} and isnew = 0 and deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into memo(memoID, subject, content, userID, "userName", receiverID, accountID, important) values (memo_memoID_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, #{userID}, #{userName}, #{receiverID}, #{accountID}, #{important})
